listing.name: New design houseboat, green centre

user.about:
Hi, we're Jasper and Eva. Together we run an interior design company where Jasper, as a designer, is the creative mind and founder of the company. Eva is responsible for a lot of communication and organization behind the scenes.

When we are in Amsterdam we love to go to museums and theaters, festivals and nice restaurants or tour over the canals since we both can sail. We made a little manual for our guests that includes some nice spots in the neighbourhood, but always feel free to ask for some more up-to-date tips!

Besides Amsterdam, we love to travel to sunny places or go for a ski in the winter. Last December we traveled for the first time with AirBnb when we celebrated our anniversary in New York. We loved the experience and enjoy meeting people that love to travel as much as we do. Hopefully our houseboat can be the perfect home for you to experience Amsterdam in a unique way!

The newly build houseboat was kind of Jaspers prestige project. It took him, and a team of professional boat builders, 2 years to complete it from its steel scratch casco. Now that it's finished we are more than happy with the result and love to share it with the AirBnb community!

We hope to see you soon, you're welcome!

listing.address: Nieuwe Keizersgracht, Amsterdam, North Holland 1018 VG, Netherlands

listing.access:
Guest have acces to the full boat; all spaces and lounge areas are accessible and can be fully used. 
On the deck outside you can lounge and even tan.
The Espresso koffie machine with delicious coffee cups and a minibar with wine, beer and soda is included! :)
listing.description:
The new and fully restored old freight ship 'Ms Tevredenheid' from 1920's is located in Amsterdam's inner centre in the green 'Plantage' neighborhood .  
The place is very piece-full, quiet and straight (email hidden) park next to the Hortus Botanical gardens. In the summer this place is ideal for bbq, sunning or even a swim. The neighborhood also offers allot of museums, the Hermitage, CarrÃ© theatre, nice bars and restaurants, cinemas and 'Artis' the Amsterdam Zoo. You can also rent a boat for touring the channels

The new stylish interior of the boat is fully rebuild to a 120sq/m light and open loft like space. The complete boat inside is finished with a fine stuck and follows the outside shape of the boat exactly which results in an sculpted artwork of round walls and ceiling structures. Main materials used are walnut, concrete, blue-steel paneling and framing, marble and moss.
The space offers two lounge areas one downstairs and one upstairs to be used with 360dg view over the park and channels. Further  a fully equipped kitchen, fireplace (gas), walk-in rain shower, 2 flat screens , domotica system, sound system and a large 2 person bedroom in the stern of the boat.
(max 2 persons allowed)

Guest have acces to the full boat; all spaces and lounge areas are accessible and can be fully used. 
On the deck outside you can lounge and even tan.
The Espresso koffie machine with delicious coffee cups and a minibar with wine, beer and soda is included! :)
 

Me or my neighbour Peter are available at all times and will make sure you have a great and pleasant stay. You can ask us for the nicest spots around and we can even take you on the channels for a boat tour on request. We also made you a guide with hotspots that we personally like best!

The boat is (email hidden) hart of Amsterdam's 'Plantage' neighborhood .  
The place is very green, piece-full and (email hidden) park next to the Hortus Botanical gardens. In the summer this little park is ideal for bbq, sunning, meeting people or even a swim. The close neighborhood also offers allot of site seeing like the Hermitage museum and jewish museum, Royal Theatre CarrÃ©, Markets at the Waterloosquare, 'Artis' the Amsterdam Zoo and nice bars, restaurants and a cinema. Also you can find a supermarket around the corner as well a bagels and beans for breakfast and a coffee company!

The best way is to use bikes, by foot or the cab service Uber! We made an overview if the nicest non-touristical places to visit and nearby places where you can rent bikes and boats. If you have any special requests please let us know.

-The Espresso koffie machine with delicious coffee cups and a minibar with wine, beer and soda is included! :)
-For bookings with the weekend included a minimum stay of 3 nights is required
-Between Christmas and New Year there is a minimum of 7 days.
listing.house_rules:
-No shoes are allowed inside the boat, they can be taken of in the steering cabin upstairs. (also not stilettos or high heels)
-If you fancy a smoke, please take place on the deck of the boat.
-Enjoy!!!!
listing.interaction: Me or my neighbour Peter are available at all times and will make sure you have a great and pleasant stay. You can ask us for the nicest spots around and we can even take you on the channels for a boat tour on request. We also made you a guide with hotspots that we personally like best!

review.comments:
What a fantastic boat and area. Logistics were easy and laid back,arriving and leaving. We really enjoyed our stay. The local neighborhood is great to get away from the really busy centre but busy enough to see what is going on in Amsterdam. The local restaurants and bars were great and Jasper's recommendation of the local Pizza place was ideal. 
The boat is really beautiful and functional . To be honest we had our lunch on the boat, sitting outside , everyday. Even though there was a huge selection of cafes to choose from in the centre - after a busy morning walking around it was an ideal place to sit and relax. The supermarket is a quick walk away with a wide range of fresh food. There is also a deli near by which sells great cheeses.
It is a quick walk into town which allows you to see all the sights but  when returning back tot he boat you have a oasis to sit and relax. LOVED IT!
